value.description: It emphasized the importance of the representational role of system; that is, the system must present data in such a way that they are interpretable, easy to understand, and concisely and consistently represented.

value.name: Representional Adequacy
value.description: Degree to which a data store presents data in a concise and organized way

subproperties.name: Schema Minimality
subproperties.details: Degree to which the schema is modeled without redundancies

subproperties.name: Schema Normalization
subproperties.details: Degree to which the schema is de-/normalized

subproperties.name: Schema Pertinence
subproperties.details: Degreee to which the schema is modeled without unnecessary elements
